title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper. It's known for its creamy, rich texture without using cream.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, cook guanciale in a skillet until crisp. Remove from heat.
In a bowl, whisk eggs, egg yolks, and most of the cheese and pepper.
Drain pasta, saving some pasta water. Immediately toss hot pasta with the egg mixture and a splash of pasta water until creamy.
Stir in the guanciale. Serve immediately, topped with remaining cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth, buttery, and creamy tomato-based gravy. A popular dish that originated in the UK.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for at least 30 minutes.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until cooked through.
In a separate pan, simmer crushed tomatoes with remaining tikka masala paste.
Stir in heavy cream and the cooked chicken. Simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot, garnished with fresh cilantro.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: A quick and healthy dish loaded with fresh vegetables and a savory sauce. It's a versatile meal that can be customized with any vegetables you have.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell peppers, snap peas)
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 3-5 minutes until crisp-tender.
In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, honey, and garlic.
Pour sauce over vegetables and toss to coat. Cook for 1 more minute.
Serve immediately with rice or noodles.

title: Classic Beef Lasagna
summary: Layers of rich meat sauce, creamy béchamel, and sheets of pasta, topped with melted cheese. A perfect comfort food for family dinners.
instructions: Brown ground beef and onion. Stir in crushed tomatoes and simmer.
Cook lasagna noodles according to package directions.
Layer noodles, meat sauce, ricotta cheese, and mozzarella in a baking dish.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 30 minutes, or until cheese is golden and bubbly.
Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A simple Neapolitan pizza topped with San Marzano tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, and extra-virgin olive oil.
ingredients: 1/2 cup pizza sauce or crushed tomatoes
instructions: Preheat oven to 500°F (260°C).
Stretch pizza dough onto a floured surface.
Spread sauce evenly over dough, leaving a small border.
Arrange mozzarella slices and basil leaves on top.
Drizzle with olive oil and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until crust is golden.
